processing_structure.text: Loop from 1 to the input value
Check if the number divides evenly (for each candidate)
If divisible, add it to the sum

advice.text: You already broke the task into clear steps. Review each comment and make sure it is specific enough to write code for.
Decide the loop bounds (which values to try) and how you will test divisibility; plan where to update the sum in the loop.
Now implement the loop: write a for loop that visits numbers from 1 to n, use the % operator to check divisibility, add divisors to sum, then print the requested sentence.
